name: Options
brief:
Configuration options for qpOASES QP solver

The Options class controls solver behavior including:
- Termination criteria (tolerances, iteration limits)
- Numerical parameters (regularization, pivoting)
- Output/printing verbosity
- Initial homotopy and scaling options

Preset configurations:
- setToDefault(): Balanced defaults
- setToReliable(): Maximum robustness
- setToMPC(): Fast for model predictive control
- setToFast(): Maximum speed, less robust
